long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This AI powered extensions gives you the power to search anything from anywhere and communicate with others with a Cmd/Ctrl+G prompt!

This AI assistant is a tool that allows users to summarize website contents, search within webpages, ask questions about content, and write social media comments and email replies. It can be used to search the internet from any location and can provide concise, human-like responses. It is useful for programmers to generate code snippets. Use it while you are on Social Medias (LinkedIn), Tech Collaborative Platforms(Github), Email (Gmail), Internet Search(Google), Coding Consoles (Colab),  and everywhere else you read, search, or write content.

Here's how it works:
•	Select any online content. Open Accintia using Cmd+G (Mac) or Ctrl+G (Windows) 
•	Alternatively click on the right hand side Icon Bar
•	Choose your action (create a reply, summarize, ask questions, search)
•	You can instruct it for a customized response (e.g. reply with a encouraging note)
